item.title: Back To Text Files
item.description: Back to Text Files Imagine my surprise that after 20 years of web development I have come back to text files and static sites. My 5 year absence from the Internet gave me fresh eyes with which to see the current trends in development. Many of which are positive, many remain unchanged, and a bunch are just silly. Even though I have been a content creator for 20 years, this is my first “blog”.

item.title: About
item.description: The About Page Mike has been around the Internet for a long time. Lurking, working and generally being a productive technologist. You can contact me by using the various social links around the site. Consultation Yes, I am currently accepting clients. Get in touch with me and lets talk! This site This site is built with Hugo! This is my first time using Hugo for anything, and so far I like it the best of the static site generators.
